Houston.Hilton College of Hotel and Restaurant M:
The Conrad N. Hilton College of Hotel and Restaurant Management (known as simply Hilton College) is one of 13 academic colleges at the University of Houston. The college offers two degree programs: a Bachelor of Science in Hotel & Restaurant Management and a Master of Science in Hospitality Management.


== History ==

Hilton College was founded in 1969, when James C. Taylor, who would become the first dean, presented Eric and Barron Hilton—sons of Conrad Hilton—with plans to build a hospitality school at the University of Houston.
